parameters.textBody:
📜I do not yet know your name among the scrolls of allies.

*Speak first with the leader of the fund*, and he shall grant you passage.

nodes.name: Angel Registered: Starting message vs number option

parameters.textBody:
=🪙You currently have {{ $json['Total points'] }} points, that's {{ ($json.Percentage * 100).toFixed(2)  }}% of a total of {{ $('Google Sheets - Get total issued points').item.json['Total issued Points'] }} issued points.

📈That's a planned potential treasure of €{{ $json['Planned Potential Value From'].toFixed(2) }} – €{{ $json['Planned Potential Value To'].toFixed(2) }} at fund culmination, which you can cash out or donate to a charity close to your heart.
=Fate has summoned you! Which adventure will you embark upon?
=⚔️ That quest is not available. Choose another adventure.

=*How may I assist you?*

1. Show me the bounty board
2. Show me my on-going quests
3. Show me my points
4. Setup quest reminders
=🔮Greetings {{ $json.Trait }} {{ $json['Angel name'] }}.
=🗺️Choose a quest ID number to unveil its secrets.
=*0. Go back*

=📖The scrolls reveal no active quests.

Seek a new adventure.
=📖These are your ongoing quests:

=📜(1/4) How often do you wish to receive word of new quests?

1. Daily
2. Weekly
3. Bi-weekly
4. Monthly
5. Don't send me reminders

=📅(2/4) Which day shall the call to adventure reach you?

1. Monday
2. Tuesday
3. Wednesday
4. Thursday
5. Friday
6. Saturday
7. Sunday

=(3/4) Which moment in the day best suits your journey?

1. In the morning (A.M.)
2. Afternoon/evening (P.M.)

value.Reminder hour:
={{ 
  $('Chat start').item.json.messages[0].text.body == "1" ? "1:00" :
  $('Chat start').item.json.messages[0].text.body == "2" ? "2:00" :
  $('Chat start').item.json.messages[0].text.body == "3" ? "3:00" :
  $('Chat start').item.json.messages[0].text.body == "4" ? "4:00" :
  $('Chat start').item.json.messages[0].text.body == "5" ? "5:00" :
  $('Chat start').item.json.messages[0].text.body == "6" ? "6:00" :
  $('Chat start').item.json.messages[0].text.body == "7" ? "7:00" :
  $('Chat start').item.json.messages[0].text.body == "8" ? "8:00" :
  $('Chat start').item.json.messages[0].text.body == "9" ? "9:00" :
  $('Chat start').item.json.messages[0].text.body == "10" ? "10:00" :
  $('Chat start').item.json.messages[0].text.body == "11" ? "11:00" :
  $('Chat start').item.json.messages[0].text.body == "12" ? "12:00" :
  "Unknown"
}}

parameters.textBody: =✅Well done. Your settings are now locked and ready.

=A call to action shall reach you on a {{ $json['Reminder freq.'] }} basis.
Every {{ $json['Reminder day'] }} at {{ $json['Reminder hour'] }} {{ $json['Reminder period'] }} UTC.

nodes.name: Function Node - Calculate Next Reminder Dates

parameters.fieldsToInclude: frequency, preferredDay, angelName, lastSent, phone, originalItem

parameter.text: ={{ $('Function Node - Calculate Next Reminder Dates').item.json.originalItem['Angel name'] }}

nodes.name: Google Sheets - Get total issued points

parameters.textBody:
=🔕The reminders have been silenced.

Your settings are locked in.

=*0. Go back*
*1. Interested - tell me more*

value.Interested:
={{ $json.Interested 
? 
$json.Interested + " - " + $('Google Sheets - Authenticate user').item.json['Angel full name'] + " (" + $('Chat start').item.json.contacts[0].wa_id +")"
:
$('Google Sheets - Authenticate user').item.json['Angel full name'] + " (" + $('Chat start').item.json.contacts[0].wa_id +")" }}

parameters.textBody:
=✨ Your interest has been shared with the fund leader and the involvement board coordinator. 

We’ll be in touch to explore how we can build together.
